vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
χαρῐτ-όω,
show grace to any one, τῆς χάριτος ἧς ἐχαρίτωσεν ἡμᾶς [NT]middle χαριτώσομαι I will bestow favour upon thee, [Refs 4th c.AD+]:—passive, to have grace shown one, to be highly favoured, [LXX+NT]; πρὸς πάντας ἀνθρώπους[Refs 4th c.AD+]; ὄμμα στροφαῖς -ούμενον probably in [Refs 4th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to give graciously, to show acts of kindness by freely giving; (n.) one highly favored; see also G5921 favor
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to give graciously, to show acts of kindness by freely giving; (n.) one highly favored; see also G5921 favor
to favor, visit with favor, to make an object of favor, to gift, Eph. 1:6; passive to be visited with free favor, be an object of gracious visitation, to give graciously Lk. 1:28*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 施惠予, 特別喜愛, 祝福
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 施惠予, 特别喜爱, 祝福
